definitions.definition: The resettlement of a group of people.
A surgical operation in which an organ is moved from a donor to a recipient ; an organ transplant .

subdefinitions.definition: The medicosurgical specialty (field) concerned with such operations.
A particular instance of such an operation (a single procedure ): a transplant .

definitions.definition: The uprooting of a tree and planting it in a new location.

main_definition: The resettlement of a group of people.
secondary_definitions: A surgical operation in which an organ is moved from a donor to a recipient ; an organ transplant .
The uprooting of a tree and planting it in a new location.
